name: Banana Chocolate Chip Breakfast Muffins 🥗
description: A breakfast recipe that uses ripe bananas and chocolate chips to make moist and flavorful muffins that are perfect for a quick breakfast or snack.
instructions: In a blender, combine all ingredients except chocolate chips. Blend thoroughly, mixing up with a spoon if needed.
Divide mixture among 12 lined muffin tins.
Sprinkle chocolate chips on top of the muffins.
